Key.Original: On mission start or setting change to true, will scan default ace loadouts and replace deprecated legacy classnames with the new counterparts.
Key.English: On mission start or setting change to true, will scan default ace loadouts and replace deprecated legacy classnames with the new counterparts.

Key.Original: Whenever the ace or vanilla arsenal are being opened, it will scan the saved loadouts and will replace deprecated legacy classnames with their new counterparts.
Key.English: Whenever the ace or vanilla arsenal are being opened, it will scan the saved loadouts and will replace deprecated legacy classnames with their new counterparts.
